data.event: Vita is served by "Shevchenko School" (part of the Border Land School Division), built in 1970.

data.event: From 1965 until 1991 the Ukrainian language (in the Canadian Ukrainian dialect) was taught as an option at the elementary and secondary levels â€“ parallel to the French language.
